greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Partial sums of A118011.
formula: Set R = round(sqrt(2*n)), then a(n) = n^2+n+R*((6*n+1)-R^2)/6.
program: (PARI) vector(80, n, R = round(sqrt(2*n)); n^2+n+R*((6*n+1)-R^2)/6) \\ _Michel Marcus_, Apr 17 2015
xref: Cf. A118011 (complement of the Connell sequence).
results.author: _Gerald Hillier_, Dec 04 2009
